title: Login Success with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that the user can login successfully with valid username and password and is redirected to the dashboard.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select preferred language (English or Urdu)
Enter valid username and password
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard page
Verify dashboard welcome message displays correct user information

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when incorrect username or password is entered and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select preferred language
Enter invalid username and/or password
Click the login button
Verify login fails and error message is displayed about invalid credentials
Verify user remains on the login page

title: Login Form Validation - Empty Fields
description: Ensure the login form validates required fields and shows error messages if username or password fields are empty.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Leave username and password fields empty
Attempt to submit the login form
Verify validation error messages appear indicating required fields
Verify login is not submitted

title: Language Switch on Login Page
description: Verify that switching the language on the login page updates all text content and direction correctly for English and Urdu.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Switch language to Urdu
Verify all login page textual content is displayed in Urdu
Verify text direction changes to RTL
Switch language back to English
Verify all text is displayed in English
Verify text direction changes to LTR

title: Protected Route Access Without Authentication
description: Verify that accessing protected routes directly without authentication redirects the user to the login page.

steps.description: Attempt to navigate directly to dashboard or staff list URL without logging in
Verify user is redirected to the login page

title: Dashboard Welcome Message and Stats Display
description: Verify that upon login, the dashboard displays personalized welcome message, digital clock with current time, Hijri date, and key statistics cards.

steps.description: Login successfully
Verify welcome message is personalized with the correct user name
Verify the digital clock shows current time accurately
Verify Hijri date is shown and updates correctly according to current date
Verify key statistics are displayed in cards with correct information

title: Sidebar Navigation Functionality
description: Verify sidebar functions correctly including staff dropdown menu, language switch, collapse/expand functionality, and logout.

steps.description: Login successfully and observe sidebar
Click on staff dropdown menu and verify sub-menu options appear
Verify navigation to staff list page on staff menu selection
Use language switch in sidebar to toggle between Urdu and English
Verify UI updates language and text direction accordingly
Click sidebar collapse button
Verify sidebar collapses and expands correctly
Click logout button in sidebar
Verify user session terminates and user is redirected to login page

title: Staff List Display with Bilingual Support
description: Verify the staff list page renders a table with all 22 staff members displaying bilingual names, emails, and contact details accurately in both languages and styles.

steps.description: Login and navigate to the staff list page via sidebar
Verify exactly 22 staff members are listed in the table
Verify each staff member's name and email is displayed in both Urdu and English correctly
Verify table is visually styled per UI/UX design specifications
Switch language from English to Urdu
Verify staff list text content updates to Urdu with proper RTL layout

title: Internationalization and RTL/LTR Text Direction Switching
description: Verify complete bilingual support including all UI elements switching languages between Urdu and English with text direction switching (RTL for Urdu, LTR for English).

steps.description: Login successfully
Switch application language to Urdu using sidebar language switch
Verify all UI textual content is displayed in Urdu
Verify all text direction styles switch to RTL layout
Switch application language back to English
Verify all UI content is displayed in English
Verify text direction switches back to LTR

title: Developer Intro Animation on App Load
description: Verify that the developer introduction animation runs once on application load without negatively impacting app performance or usability.

steps.description: Load the application fresh (clear cache and visit URL)
Verify developer intro animation is displayed
Verify animation completes and hands over control to login or dashboard screen smoothly
Verify no significant delay or freezing occurs during animation

title: Routing and Navigation Enforcement
description: Verify React Router DOM is correctly configured to protect routes, redirect unauthenticated users, and allow navigation among public and protected pages according to user authentication state.

steps.description: Navigate to public routes (login)
Verify public routes are accessible when unauthenticated
Navigate to protected routes (dashboard, staff list) when unauthenticated
Verify user is redirected to login page
Login successfully
Navigate to protected routes
Verify protected pages load correctly and show content

title: Sidebar Language Switch Persists Across Pages
description: Verify that language selection made by user via sidebar persists across different pages and remains after navigation within the app.

steps.description: Login successfully
Switch language to Urdu using sidebar
Navigate to dashboard page
Verify UI is still in Urdu and layout is RTL
Navigate to staff list page
Verify UI remains in Urdu with RTL text direction
Switch language to English via sidebar
Navigate to placeholder pages (students, attendance)
Verify UI updates to English and text direction is LTR consistently

title: Error Handling for Invalid Route Access
description: Verify that navigation to invalid or undefined routes shows an appropriate error page or redirects to a valid page.

steps.description: Login successfully
Manually enter an invalid URL path in the browser
Verify a 404 error page or friendly error message is displayed
Verify user has option to navigate back to valid pages
